vernu/vps-audit

bash script for quick VPS security and performance checks

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Bash script monitors Linux in real time, blocks threats, has honeypots and malware scans
  • generates easy-to-share security audit reports for your code and domains
  • Maps Linux Auditd rules to MITRE ATT&CK framework
  • monitor linux processes and cron jobs without root
  • command-line tool for safer curl bash scripts
  • Audits container images for security benchmarks
  • Audits SSH server and client configuration
  • SSH gateway for authentication and auditability
  • static analyzer for Rust smart contracts with templates and GitHub Action
